title: EXP Grinding
description: A Pokémon trainer is training their Charmander on wild Caterpie in Veridian Forest.

title: Stroll through the BeanBean Fields
description: This picture is based on the game Mario and Luigi SuperStar Saga. I made the background myself and altered 8 bit sprites to create my own sprites in reference to the other games in the series. Mario and Luigi by Nintendo, hopefully no trouble for this.

title: Mountain Skies
description: This art was inspired by a mountain landscape picture taken by Michael Gabriel, I really liked the sky in this picture, and I wanted to see what I could do with it.
tools: I used PixieEditor to create my pixel art!

title: beach sunset
description: This pixel art resembles a sunset over the ocean.
